entry.title: Solved unable to install nokogiri to ubuntu 12.04
entry.content:
I tried install nokogiri into my ubuntu 12.04 server, but failed with following error message

``` checking for libxml/parser.h… yes checking for libxslt/xslt.h… yes checking for libexslt/exslt.h… yes checking for iconv_open() in iconv.h… yes checking for xmlParseDoc() in -lxml2… yes

checking for xsltParseStylesheetDoc() in -lxslt… no

libxslt is missing. please visit http://nokogiri.org/tutorials/installing_nokogiri.html for help with installing dependencies.

```

Official install guide page and many other sites said to install libxslt1-dev, but it does not solve my problem.

Ubuntu 12.04 installs libxslt1-dev instead of libxslt-dev, so I installed libxslt source code(libxslt-1.1.22) and installed by myself.

Then I cloud install nokogiri.
